attributes.action: Improve awareness and stimulate research of the effects of Vitamin D and sunlight exposure to vunerable groups such as those with Sarcoidosis
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There has been a lot of publicity recently concerning the benefits of sunlight and vitamin D.  However we ask that the PM encourages more study into this.  There are sufferers of a fairly rare condition called Sarcoidosis (as well as those with Mycobacterium infections and idiopathic hypercalciuria and hypercalcaemia) to whom vitamin D supplements or even just venturing out into sunlight can be severely detrimental to their health.
